author: striker
msg: Get rid of the CRs in this file.

author: striker
msg: Remove all iconv detection from APR.

author: wrowe
msg: A Fuggly patch to get things moving along.  Define iconv_() as a wrapper
to prefix apr_iconv or iconv as appropriate based on APR_HAS_APR_ICONV.
Not even trying to teach Unix about APR_HAS_APR_ICONV right now.

author: wrowe
msg: Missed one earlier, all became APU_DECLARE.

author: gstein
msg: Fix some error handling for platforms with a broken iconv(). In
certain cases, iconv will return -1 to indicate an error, but it won't
set the errno variable. Return EINVAL in these cases.
